definitions.definition: A manual worker ; a labourer or artisan .
Someone who builds or repairs machinery , a technician ; now specifically, someone who works with and repairs the mechanical parts of a motor vehicle , aircraft or similar.
A device , method or means ; a function .

subdefinitions.definition: A function , rule or other implementation that dictates gameplay ; a ludeme , a feature .
examples: This game has a mechanic where if you run toward a ledge you automatically jump off rather than just falling.

definitions.definition: A cheat who manipulates the cards or dice.

main_definition: ( now chiefly historical ) A manual worker ; a labourer or artisan . [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: Someone who builds or repairs machinery , a technician ; now specifically, someone who works with and repairs the mechanical parts of a motor vehicle , aircraft or similar. [from 17th c.]
A device , method or means ; a function .
( gambling ) A cheat who manipulates the cards or dice.
